actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the tax on handgun ammunition, to impose the special occupational tax and registration requirements on importers and manufacturers of handgun ammunition, and for other purposes.
short_title: Real Cost of Handgun Ammunition Act

summary.text: Real Cost of Handgun Ammunition Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the excise tax on certain ammunition. Imposes a special (occupational) tax on importers and manufacturers of certain handgun ammunition for each place of business.

titles.title: Real Cost of Handgun Ammunition Act

A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the tax on handgun ammunition, to impose the special occupational tax and registration requirements on importers and manufacturers of handgun ammunition, and for other purposes.
